name: CenTris
description:
Tetris with a twist! Centriminos fall towards a center square. Complete layers to win points! Nokia 3310 Jam 5 submission.

In main menu you can start the game, choose between the 3 palettes and watch the tutorial animation: roughly 2 minutes of CenTris basics, to help you understand what's going on in your screen if you missed something.

Enjoy the nokia-beep version of The Dance of the Sugar Plum Fairy (that one from NES Tetris) while in menu and tutorial, or Korobeiniki while you play, the song gets faster when you reach certain levels to make you feel like a pro CenTris player! If you get bored of the music, you can mute it with 0/M

Controls ActionNumpadWASDArrowsUp8WUp Arrow
Down2SDown ArrowLeft4ALeft ArrowRight6DRight ArrowCW Rotation9PXCCW Rotation7OZSelect5EnterSpaceMute music0MM

Note: controls depend on the gravity of the piece you are playing, except for up gravity, in which Left and Right are actions Left and Right, respectively.

What's Next?

There were some QoL features I couldn't get done because of time, so wait for an after-jam update to enjoy:

  • Better rotation system, with wallkicks and 180-rotations
  • Alternative control scheme: gravity-independent
  • Nokia 3310 frame around the game
  • More color palettes
  • Android build!

Hope you like it!

If you get to 999999 score, send a screenshot!
